summary: The work spans multiple product teams working on OTP (One-Time Purchase) features, dashboard improvements, and funnel optimization. Key focus areas include implementing OTP banners and graduation components, improving funnel navigation and plan selection UX, and addressing test quarantine issues. Several teams are also working on product detail pages, reviews, and experiment health monitoring.

decisions.what: Display new portion options UI based on feedingPlanType quiz answer instead of triggering allocation event from plans-selection screen
decisions.rationale: Avoid triggering allocation events from the plans-selection screen while still showing appropriate UI

decisions.what: Use Figma MCP to create graduation component
decisions.rationale: Leverage Figma integration for component creation

decisions.what: Contact us/FAQ CTA marked as not a blocker to release but quick improvement
decisions.rationale: Prioritization decision to not block release while acknowledging value
S-Box downgrade experiment marked as Won't do

initiatives.name: OTP (One-Time Purchase) Dashboard & Funnel
initiatives.description: Implement complete OTP experience including dashboard components, banner logic, data fetching, and graduation flows for customers without subscriptions

initiatives.name: Funnel Navigation Improvements
initiatives.description: Enhance user experience in funnel by improving back button behavior, pre-selecting previously chosen plans, and optimizing navigation flow

initiatives.name: Different Portions Feature (GD)
initiatives.description: Implement quiz and plan selection changes to support different portion percentages for pet food plans

initiatives.name: Product Detail Page Enhancement (TPT)
initiatives.description: Add reviews, scroll-to-top functionality, and improved tracking to product detail pages

initiatives.name: Test Quarantine System
initiatives.description: Prevent flaky tests from executing by quarantining problematic test specs with low success rates

initiatives.name: Price-Menu Experiment
initiatives.description: New experimentation initiative for price and menu optimization

initiatives.name: Improve Value Communication
initiatives.description: Lower cancellation rates by improving benefit communication in Dashboard and Cancellation Deflection, supporting all benefit types

initiatives.name: OTP Discount Comms (FJ VMS)
initiatives.description: Add discount communications and voucher support for OTP on Factor Japan VMS

blockers.description: mr_charge_at_checkout experiment showing as unhealthy in Statsig dashboard with 'No Values Checks' issue
Returning OTP customers get redirected to subscription-loading when trying to make another one-time purchase
blockers.impact: Re-ordering flow broken for existing OTP customers

blockers.description: Scope unclear until design is finalized for hiding My Deliveries Dashboard

entities.name: Beatrice Dimarucut
entities.context: Product owner/manager asking for technical details and making prioritization decisions

entities.name: Himash Tehan
entities.context: Technical lead providing scope clarification and suggesting Figma MCP usage

entities.name: Marina Guthmann
entities.context: Confirming Figma MCP approach for component creation

entities.name: Contentful
entities.context: CMS used for benefit text, reviews data, and content management

entities.name: Statsig
entities.context: Experimentation platform showing health issues for mr_charge_at_checkout experiment

entities.name: Good Chop
entities.context: Brand for OTP dashboard features and cancellation deflection

entities.name: Factor Japan (FJ VMS)
entities.context: Brand receiving OTP discount comms and lokalise key updates

entities.name: GD (likely Good Dog/Pet product)
entities.context: Project code for pet food features including multipet flow and different portions

entities.name: Figma MCP
entities.context: Tool for creating components from Figma designs

entities.name: Lokalise
entities.context: Localization platform for managing translation keys

entities.name: Quarantine System
entities.context: System to prevent flaky tests from executing, targeting 77% success rate tests

technical_patterns.context: Reviews rendered under feature flag, new UI displayed based on quiz answers
Required for graduation component with Contentful content and config-based voucher values
Systematic approach to handle tests with ~77% success rates and high retry counts
Using Statsig diagnostics to track experiment health and address 'No Values Checks' issues
Using Contentful for benefit text, reviews data, and dynamic content management
Pre-selecting previously selected plans when users navigate back in funnel

technical_patterns.pattern: Conditional UI rendering based on quiz state
technical_patterns.context: Displaying portion options based on feedingPlanType answer availability
Reusing existing tracking events where applicable and adding new ones for new interactions

dependencies.context: Scope clarity needed for My Deliveries Dashboard implementation
Benefit text, reviews data, and content retrieval for multiple features
Experiment allocation and health monitoring for multiple experiments
E2E test validation for different portions quiz and change plan flows
Translation keys for OTP free shipping text and discount comms
Need to determine subscription presence to show/hide dashboard components
